name: Escape from Ganymede
description:
You have been captured and imprisoned by the Free City of Olympus Mons on their Ganymede base. They have subjected you to various experiments, one of which has heightened your awareness and reaction time to superhuman levels. Fearing their creation, they ordered an execution but found only an empty cell and a missing prototype ship. Destroy their drone control center and escape to the relative safety of Earth.

The ship will follow your cursor. Left click to shoot. Right click to drift.
